original_text: So we see this: God still has a place ready for his people, where they can rest. They will rest as God rested on the seventh day.
korean_text: 그런즉 안식할 때가 하나님의 백성에게 남아 있도다

sentences.original_text: God still has a place ready for his people
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님은 여전히 그의 백성을 위해 준비된 곳을 가지고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: They will rest as God rested
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 하나님이 쉬셨던 것처럼 쉴 것입니다
